basics.name: Roger Mesén Delgado
basics.label: Data Scientist & GIS Specialist
basics.summary: I am a Data Scientist with extensive experience in data science and geospatial analysis. Proficient in GIS, APIs, Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-Learn, I optimize workflows and data analysis. My focus on continuous improvement and professional development drives informed decision-making and organizational efficiency.

work.name: Fresh Del Monte
work.summary: Manage and analyze agricultural data to enhance in-season decisions and sustainability. Integrate earth observations, imagery, field data, and real-time streams for improved efficiency and profitability.
highlights: Maintenance of Oracle DB: table creation, coordination of diverse tasks.
Development of maps and dashboards integrating soil, irrigation, yield, production cost, profit, and compliance data.
Implementation of EDA and ADA using Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Scikit-Learn for predictive modeling and data-driven insights.

work.name: Geotecnologías S.A. (ESRI)
work.summary: Supported GIS projects by designing and maintaining geospatial databases, creating maps and aerial photography, and ensuring compliance with standards and quality policies.
highlights: Reviewed data flow, management, and distribution activities to support GIS operations.
Assisted technical teams in system design and development, staying current with the latest GIS developments.
Planned and coordinated GIS activities, including application deployment and quality control standards.

education.institution: Colegio Técnico Profesional de Buenos Aires
